[阴]
An unorthodox variant simplified from 陰 ( 侌 → 月 ) which can be found in various historical dictionaries such as the Kangxi dictionary .
Eventually adopted as an official simplified character by the People's Republic of China in 1956.

[陰]
According to Shuowen , a phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *qrɯm ): semantic 阜 + phonetic 侌 ( yīn ) .
